sys_ui_macro.name: virtual_attachments
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_config" expression="JSON.stringify(new x_376096_va.ConfigUtil().generate(current.getTableName(), current.getUniqueValue(), current.isNewRecord(), true))" />
	<script>
		var x_376096_va = x_376096_va || {};
		x_376096_va.config = (function () {
			var config = JSON.parse('$[jvar_config]');
			if (x_376096_va.loader) {
				x_376096_va.loader.set('config', config);
			}
		
			return config;
		})();
	</script>
</j:jelly>
